definition: descendants of the Fiery Emperor and the Yellow Emperor (i.e. Han Chinese people)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Through born from the same heritage, we are all affected by the different worlds around us.
sentences.chinese: 儘管我們都是炎黃子孫，卻受着不同環境的影響。

sentences.english: We are all the descendants of the people.
sentences.chinese: 我們都是炎黃子孫的後代。

sentences.english: Kim countryman from the Yellow River basin is the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 金鄉人源於黃河流域，是炎黃子孫。

sentences.english: To visit Mount Tai has been Chinese wish for thousands years.
sentences.chinese: 登遊泰山是數千年來炎黃子孫的宿願。

sentences.english: We are of the yellow race and descendants of the Yellow Emperor.
sentences.chinese: 我們是黃種人，是炎黃子孫。

sentences.english: If you are of Chinese descent you may pay tribute to the tomb of Huangdi (Yellow Emperor) first Chinese emperor.
sentences.chinese: 作爲炎黃子孫還可以去拜謁離西安不遠的黃帝陵。

sentences.english: You put the policy of benevolence and the teaching of philanthropy into Chinese people's mind.
sentences.chinese: 你把仁政博愛之道之禮，潛進炎黃子孫的思維。

definition: to follow the past and herald the future (idiom); part of a historical transition/forming a bridge between earlier and later stages
passed on from generation to generation (idiom); to hand down
prosperity and decline (of a kingdom)/rise and fall
lit. when you drink water, think of its source (idiom); gratitude for blessings and their well-spring/Don't forget where your happiness come from./Be grateful for all your blessings!
to love Hong Kong (usually implying that one also supports the PRC government)
lit. source is distant and the flow is long (idiom); fig. sth goes back to the dim and distant past/a lot of water has flowed under the bridge since then
style of study/academic atmosphere/school discipline/school traditions
to develop/to make full use of
